item.title: Kirsty add a quote by W. Bruce Cameron
item.description: "Because failure isn't an option if success is just a matter of more effort." -- W. Bruce Cameron

item.title: Kirsty add a quote by W. Bruce Cameron
item.description: "My purpose, my whole life, had been to love him and be with him, to make him happy. I didn’t want to cause any unhappiness now—in that way, I decided it was probably better than he wasn’t here to see this, though I missed him so much at that moment the ache of it was as bad as the strange pains in my belly." -- W. Bruce Cameron

item.title: Kirsty add a quote by W. Bruce Cameron
item.description: "Dogs have important jobs, like barking when the doorbell rings, but cats have no function in a house whatsoever." -- W. Bruce Cameron

item.title: Kirsty add a quote by W Bruce Cameron
item.description: "This was, I decided, my purpose as a dog, to comfort the boy whenever he needed me." -- W Bruce Cameron

item.title: Kirsty add a quote by W Bruce Cameron
item.description: "I nuzzled them both to remind them that there was really no need to grieve, since I was okay and really a much better pet than Smokey ever was." -- W Bruce Cameron
